div.h3: LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUR ADIPISICING ELIT.
div.p: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

a.expr:href: params("https://www.tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool/preview",{canonicalUrl: data:post.url.canonical, caption: data:post.snippet, posttype: "link", title: data:post.title})

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons
